Notes: Residential redevelopment of former commercial brownfield site comprising up to 96 residential units including affordable homes. Improved off site access road and footways, traffic lights and calming measures, drainage arrangements and flood protection measures, wetland area, raising and lowering of ground levels, landscaping, local equipped area of play, youth shelter and car park. Residential capacity of site originally considered through SHLAA SHA/BID/18. Site identified as a non-strategic housing site in North Devon and Torridge Local Plan 2011-2031 (Appendix 5). Outline permission (1/0041/2009/OUTM) granted 21.9.21. Site not identified as being deliverable through the most recent published Statement of Five Year Housing Land Supply (November 2019), although considered developable in longer term.
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
SiteNameAddress: Land at Nuttaberry Works, Bideford

Notes: Residential potential of site considered through SHLAA SHA/BID/38. The site is identifies this site as a Bideford Regeneration Site (BID07) for a mix of housing, leisure and retail uses and listed as a Non Strategic Housing Site in the North Devon and Torridge Local Plan 2011-2031. Site subject to an endorsed Site Development Brief. As of 31/03/21 site has approval (1/1126/2020/FULM) for demolition of existing site buildings and mixed use redevelopment providing 85 residential units, commercial units (Class E) with public open space, car parking, floating pontoon and associated landscaping work. Site identified as being deliverable in last published statement of five year housing land supply (November 2019). Site was also subject to previous lapsed planning permission (1/0578/2014/FULM) for mixed use development comprising of 52 residential units, approximately 763 sq metres of retail / commercial development, open space, car parking, marina (including managers accommodation) and associated development.

Notes: Site allocated for housing development through Policy GTT01 in North Devon and Torridge Local Plan 2011-2031. Residential potential of site considered through SHLAA SHA/GTT/56 (previously SHA/GTT/11). Site subject to hybrid outline/full application (1/0039/2016/OUTM) for the erection of 13 dwellings on northern part of site with new access to Limer's Hill (full) and the erection of up to 136 dwellings, up to 200m2 of retail (A1) floorspace, bat house and adaption of existing building on southern part of the site to accommodate 5 units of B1, B2, B8 or mixed B class uses (approx 1,300m2) with access via the existing 3 other accesses off Limer's Hill together with open space; drainage, road and other infrastructure, all following the demolition buildings and structures on site (outline). Site also subject to a number of applications with resolutions to grant permission subject to a joint S106 agreement: 1/0528/2020/REMM (71 dwellings); 1/0526/2020/FULM (19 dwellings); 1/0524/2020/FULM (18 dwellings) [NB additional outline ( 1/1231/2018/OUTM) for 52 dwellings on adjacent SHLAA site GTT/49 (SW Water land - not brownfield) forms part of the wider allocation and proposed to be included in the joint S106].
